attributes.action: Keep going with the new highway code and force cyclists off the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclists pay no tax, or insurance and regularly go through red lights, sometimes getting run over and almost always succesfully suing the innocent driver of a motor vehicle.

Anything to make it criminal for them to be on the road when we have payed for cycle lanes for them to use is a good idea.
